org.openmap4u

Class Canvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openmap4u.Canvas
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AreaOfInterestTransformable, Plugable, Transformable, DrawOrWriteable, OverrideDrawOrWriteable

    public class Canvas
extends Object
implements Plugable, DrawOrWriteable, OverrideDrawOrWriteable, AreaOfInterestTransformable
    Default implementation of the Canvas interface.
    Author:
    Michael Hadrbolec

      • scale

        public OverrideDrawOrWriteable scale(double scaleXFactor,
                                     double scaleYFactor)
        Currently only internal. Allows to set different scale factors in x and y direction.
        Parameters:
        scaleXFactor - The scaleFactor in x direction.
        scaleYFactor - The scaleFactor in y direction.
        Returns:
        Allows to change the area of interest.

      • write

        public void write(Path out)
           throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: DrawOrWriteable
        Writes the drawing result to the given path. If no primitives have been drawn the canvas is empty.
        Specified by:
        write in interface DrawOrWriteable
        Parameters:
        out - The path into which the drawing result will be written.
        Throws:
        IOException - Is thrown in the case an error occurs.
